questions.question: Asa sa mosunod nga mga materyales ang mosuyop og tubig?
Asa sa mga materyales ang molutaw sa tubig?

choices.choice: Kahoy, takip sa plastik nga botelya, tapahan
Salamin, lansang nga asero, tasa nga seramika

questions.question: Asa sa mga materyales ang kasagaran madaot o malata?

choices.choice: Aluminyo nga papel, goma, mga lansang

questions.question: Unsang sakit ang mahimong makuha sa pag-expose sa mga daot o latang materyales?

choices.choice: Sakit sa ulo ug sore throat.

questions.question: Unsa ang usa ka epekto sa latang materyales sa kahimsog ug kaluwasan?

choices.choice: Makadani og mga insekto ug makapahinabo og sakit
Mamahimong limpyo ug klaro ang tubig

questions.question: Ngano nga importante ang pagbasa sa label sa produkto?

choices.choice: Aron mahibalo sa brand name lang
Aron mahibalo sa hustong paggamit ug safety
Aron makita ang kolor sa produkto

questions.question: Unsa ang labing maayo nga paagi sa pagbahin-bahin sa mga materyales?

choices.choice: Base sa gidak-on ug porma lang
Base sa biodegradable o malata ug non-biodegradable o di-malata

questions.question: Unsaon paglabay sa basura nga husto/Insakto?
Unsa ang pagpanalipod sa kaugalingon o safety precaution sa paglabay sa basura?

choices.choice: Paggamit sa kamot nga walay panalipod
Pagdula sa mga hait nga butang sa basura

questions.question: Unsa mahitabo sa solid nga materyales kung ipugos?
Unsa mahitabo sa materyales kung initon ug bugnawon?

choices.choice: Mausab ang gidak-on, porma, o estado

questions.question: Unsa mahitabo sa solid nga materyales kung isagol sa laing solid?
Unsa mahitabo sa solid nga materyales kung isagol sa liquid?
Unsa mahitabo sa liquid nga materyales kung isagol sa laing liquid?

choices.choice: Mahimong maghiusa o magbulag depende sa klase

questions.question: Asa sa mosunod ang naghulagway sa kausaban sa materyales nga mapuslanon o makadaot sa palibot?

choices.choice: Ang pagsunog sa plastik makagawas og daotang aso
Ang pag-compost sa biodegradable nga basura makabuhat og abono
Ang pag-recycle sa papel makapamenos sa basura

chapters.title: Pangunang mga Parte sa Lawas sa Tawo

questions.question: Unsa ang pangunang gamit sa mga bukog?

choices.choice: Maghimo og pagkaon para sa lawas

questions.question: Unsa ang naa sa sulod sa bungo sa manok?
Unsa ang kasagarang kadaot sa lawas sa sports?
Asa nga mga bukog ang moprotekta sa sulod nga parte sa lawas?
Unsaon pagtunaw sa pagkaon sa tiyan?

choices.choice: Pinaagi sa pag-uban sa gastric juice ug paglihok-lihok sa tiyan
Pinaagi sa diretsong pagsulod sa dugo

questions.question: Unsaon pagtunaw sa pagkaon sa tinai?

choices.choice: Pinaagi sa pagsuyop sa nutrisyon paingon sa dugo
Pinaagi sa pagbahin sa solid nga piraso

questions.question: Unsa ang mga gamit sa kidney?

choices.choice: Mofilter sa hugaw sa dugo ug maghimo og ihi
Motunaw sa pagkaon ug mosuyop sa nutrisyon

questions.question: Unsa ang makapahimo nato nga motubag sa stimuli?
Unsaon sa mga hayop pagbuhi sa tubig?

choices.choice: Pinaagi sa pagbaton og hasang, kapay, o flippers

questions.question: Unsaon sa mga hayop pagbuhi sa yuta?

choices.choice: Pinaagi sa mga bitiis, baga, ug panalipod sa lawas sama sa balhibo o panit
Pinaagi sa pagginhawa gamit ang hasang

questions.question: Unsaon sa mga hayop pagkuha o pagkaon sa ilang pagkaon?

choices.choice: Pinaagi sa espesyal nga parte sa lawas sama sa tuka, ngipon, o kuko
Pinaagi sa paghulat nga mahulog ang pagkaon sa ilang baba
Pinaagi sa pag-inom lang og tubig

questions.question: Asa nga parte sa lawas sa hayop ang makatabang sa pagpanalipod batok sa kaaway?

choices.choice: Kabhang, bagis, hait nga ngipon, ug kuko
choices.imagePath: assets/images/choices/Shells, quills, sharp teeth, and claws.png

choices.choice: Pako sa tubig, panit, ug bigote

questions.question: What are animals found in a community and their habitat?

choices.choice: Fish in the ocean, birds in trees

questions.question: Which animals are adapted to a particular habitat?

choices.choice: Camel in the desert, polar bear in the Arctic

questions.question: Which is one characteristic of plants?

choices.choice: They move from place to place
They make their own food through photosynthesis

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of aquatic plants?
What is the difference between aquatic and terrestrial plants?

choices.choice: Aquatic plants grow in water; terrestrial plants grow on land
Aquatic plants grow on land; terrestrial plants grow in water
Aquatic plants do not need sunlight; terrestrial plants do
Terrestrial plants need water but aquatic plants do not

questions.question: What do plants need in order to grow?

choices.choice: Sunlight, water, air, and nutrients from soil

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of a terrestrial plant?
How can you grow your favorite plants?

choices.choice: By giving them enough sunlight, water, and nutrients
By placing them in total darkness
By not watering them at all

questions.question: What are seeds?

choices.choice: The part of a plant that develops into a new plant

questions.question: Which is a monocot and which is a dicot?
What do seeds need to germinate?

choices.choice: Water, air, and the right temperature

questions.question: If an insect goes through egg  larva  pupa  adult, what kind of metamorphosis is it?
Which of the following are egg-laying animals?
What is the life cycle of animals?

choices.choice: The stages of growth and change an animal goes through from birth to adult

questions.question: Is interaction with living things important?

choices.choice: Yes, because it helps maintain balance in nature
No, because living things do not need each other
No, because they can survive alone

questions.question: Are there benefits with interaction among living things and the environment?

choices.choice: Yes, it provides food, shelter, and helps ecosystems function

questions.question: Which is a harmful interaction among living things?
Which environmental conditions are needed by living things?

choices.choice: Food, water, air, and suitable temperature

questions.question: How are organisms affected by changes in the environment?

choices.choice: They may adapt, move to a new place, or die

questions.question: What are the effects of force on the shape of an object?

choices.choice: It can bend, stretch, or flatten the object

questions.question: How does force affect the size of an object?

choices.choice: It can make the object smaller or larger
It turns the object into a liquid

questions.question: Which materials are attracted to a magnet?
How does force affect the movement of an object?

choices.choice: It can start, stop, speed up, slow down, or change the direction of the object

questions.question: What kind of force is exerted by a magnet?
How does heat transfer in solid and liquid materials?

choices.choice: In solids through conduction; in liquids through convection
In solids through convection; in liquids through radiation
In solids through evaporation; in liquids through conduction
In solids through radiation; in liquids through condensation

questions.question: How does light travel?
How does sound travel in different materials?

choices.choice: Faster in solids, slower in gases
Faster in gases, slower in solids

questions.question: Which of the following is a property of light?

choices.choice: It can bend, reflect, and be absorbed
It can only be seen in the dark

questions.question: Which of the following is a property of sound?

choices.choice: It can travel through solids, liquids, and gases
It can be stored in a box

questions.question: Which is a way to protect oneself from intense light and sound?
Can you identify the Types and Characteristics of Soil?
What do plants need in order to grow?
Uses of water from different sources?
How important is water in the environment?

choices.choice: It helps plants, animals, and people live

questions.question: How do you use weather instruments?

choices.choice: By looking at them from a distance
By using each tool for its specific purpose, such as a thermometer for temperature and a rain gauge for rainfall
By guessing the weather without using them
By placing them indoors away from sunlight and wind

questions.question: Is the weather condition the same in different places and different times?

choices.choice: Yes, because the Earth receives sunlight equally everywhere
No, because weather is affected by location, time, and environmental factors
Yes, because all places have the same temperature in the morning

questions.question: Which is the safest precaution during different weather conditions?

choices.choice: Wearing light clothes during hot days and seeking shade
Going to open areas during thunderstorms
Swimming in rivers during heavy rains
Staying outside during strong winds to observe the weather

questions.question: What is the importance of the Suns heat and light?

choices.choice: It provides energy for plants to make food and keeps Earth warm
It makes the Earth spin faster
It changes the color of the sky permanently
It allows the Moon to produce its own light

questions.question: What are some facts about Light and Shadows?

choices.choice: Shadows are made when light is blocked
Shadows are only seen at night

questions.question: What is the Role of the Sun in the Water Cycle?

choices.choice: Heats water so it becomes vapor

questions.question: What are the effects of the Sun's Heat and Light?

choices.choice: Helps plants grow and warms Earth

questions.question: Practices of Safety Precautions on the Effects of the Sun

choices.choice: Wear a hat and drink water
Play outside at noon without shade
Wear thick jackets in hot weather
